TextToVoice.document:
This API is used to convert any text to speech, allowing your devices and applications to talk to users.
​Tencent Cloud Text To Speech (TTS) can synthesize speech from text in real time for many use cases, such as audiobook and news apps, voice reminders on smart devices, quick synthesis of a celebrity's voice based on existing programs or certain voice records available on the Internet, and personalized vehicle navigation systems.
It is free for use in beta.
It supports SSML. For syntax details, see [SSML](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/1073/49575?from_cn_redirect=1).
TextToVoice.name: Synthesizes basic speech from text

members.document: The word in the text that is sent.
members.name: Text

members.document: The start timestamp of the word in the synthesized audio data, in milliseconds.
members.name: BeginTime

members.document: The end timestamp of the word in the synthesized audio data, in milliseconds.
members.name: EndTime

members.document: The start index of the character in the whole sentence, starting from 0.
members.name: BeginIndex

members.document: The end index of the character in the whole sentence, starting from 0.
members.name: EndIndex

members.document:
The source text for synthesizing speech, which is encoded in UTF-8.
It can contain up to 150 Chinese characters (a full-width punctuation as a Chinese character) or 500 letters ( a half-width punctuation as a letter).
members.name: Text

members.document: The `SessionId` of a request, which will be returned as-is. We recommend that you pass characters like uuid to prevent repetition.
members.name: SessionId

members.document: Volume range: [0, 10], corresponding to 11 volume levels. 0 is the default value, indicating the normal volume. There is no mute option.
members.name: Volume

members.document: Project ID, which defaults to 0 and can be customized.
members.name: ProjectId

members.document: Model type, with `1` for the default model.
members.name: ModelType

members.document:

  • 10510000-zhixiaoyao (Chinese)

    • Premium voices
    Premium voices have higher fidelity and more natural-sounding quality than standard voices. For price details, see [Purchase Guide](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/1073/34112?from_cn_redirect=1).

members.name: VoiceType

members.document:
Primary language type:
  • 1 - Chinese (default)
  • 2 - English
members.name: PrimaryLanguage

members.document:
Audio sample rate:
  • 16000: 16k (default)
  • 8000: 8k
members.name: SampleRate

members.document: Format of returned audio. Valid values: WAV (default), MP3, and PCM.
members.name: Codec

members.document: Whether to enable the timestamp feature. Default value: `false`.
members.name: EnableSubtitle

members.document: Segmentation rate. Valid range: [0,1,2]; default value: `0`. The higher the value, the lower the rate, and the easier the segmentation. It is recommended not to change this parameter to ensure better synthesis quality.
members.name: SegmentRate

members.document: Base64-encoded WAV/MP3 audio data
members.name: Audio

members.document: The `SessionId` of a request
members.name: SessionId

members.document: Timestamp information. If the timestamp feature is not enabled, an empty array will be returned.
members.name: Subtitles

members.document: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId
